AbilityToBearLosses.Description: No loss of invested capital, 100% protected
AbilityToBearLosses.Name: Fully protected capital

AbilityToBearLosses.Description: Partial loss of capital possible, protection between 0% and 100%
AbilityToBearLosses.Name: Partially protected capital

AbilityToBearLosses.Description: Total loss of invested capital possible, protection against further losses
AbilityToBearLosses.Name: Not protected capital

AbilityToBearLosses.Description: Losses larger than invested capital possible, no protection at all
AbilityToBearLosses.Name: Loss of more than capital

DistributionStrategies.Description: Can be sold online or without advisory
DistributionStrategies.Name: Execution only

DistributionStrategies.Description: Can be sold with investment advisory only
DistributionStrategies.Name: Advised

InvestmentObjectives.Description: Investment must be easy to liquidate to provide cash liquidity
InvestmentObjectives.Name: Cash liquidity supply

InvestorTypes.Name: Retail

InvestorTypes.Description: Instrument suitable for professional clients only
InvestorTypes.Name: Professional

KnowledgeAndExperiences.Name: Basic
